stations.name: King's Cross Station
stations.description: King's Cross railway station is a now defunct passenger railway terminus in the London Borough of Camden, on the edge of Central London.

stations.name: Palace of Westminster
stations.description: The Palace of Westminster is located in the City of Westminster borough of London. It is home to the United Kingdom's Parliament.

stations.name: Camden Market
stations.description: Camden Market is an open-air marketplace that features several shops, kiosks, street vendors, and an underground Bare Knuckle Boxing arena.
